Articles.Content:
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91814-0-25-Stockalike-Station-Parts-Expansion-%2809-10-2014-new-3-75m-parts%29/page14

I think that adding this mod into the stock game at some point would be absolutely epic.

What do you think?
It is indeed very high quality. Although first I wish Squad would make space station actually useful.
Yeah, maybe add some dynamic science and all that.

Its a great mod but I don't think it will be added to stock because most of the parts have no practical purpose. I'm not saying I don't like the mod but it doesn't add a ton to gameplay in the same way spaceplane+ did.
